title: Metadata
description:
This file controls all the SEO and social sharing metadata for the LeadCMS.ai website. By editing this file, you can update the site’s title, description, icons, Open Graph, Twitter card information, and search engine indexing settings.

For more details on each field and how metadata works in Next.js, see the official documentation: https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/functions/generate-metadata
author: Peter Liapin
